title: Onsite playground, Exterior storage available, Controlled-entry access
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '1', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Feet:', '702', 'Address:', '2001 Ramrod Ave', 'South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Professional onsite management', 'Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', 'Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Wood-style plank flooring', 'Exterior storage available', 'Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Controlled-entry access', 'Subway tile kitchen backsplash', 'Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', 'In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Separate dining area', 'Two-tone paint scheme Select units', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
